sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-card class="simulation-info-card mb-3">
      <v-card-title class="info-title py-2">模拟信息</v-card-title>
      <v-list dense>
        <v-list-item>
          <v-list-item-content>
            <v-list-item-subtitle>算法类型</v-list-item-subtitle>
            <v-list-item-title>{{ formatAlgorithm(simulation.algorithm_type) }}</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item-content>
        </v-list-item>
        
        <v-list-item>
          <v-list-item-content>
            <v-list-item-subtitle>猎手数量</v-list-item-subtitle>
            <v-list-item-title>{{ simulation.hunters ? simulation.hunters.length : 0 }}</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item-content>
        </v-list-item>
        
        <v-list-item>
          <v-list-item-content>
            <v-list-item-subtitle>目标数量</v-list-item-subtitle>
            <v-list-item-title>{{ simulation.targets ? simulation.targets.length : 0 }}</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item-content>
        </v-list-item>
        
        <v-list-item>
          <v-list-item-content>
            <v-list-item-subtitle>环境大小</v-list-item-subtitle>
            <v-list-item-title>{{ simulation.environment_size || 500 }} x {{ simulation.environment_size || 500 }}</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item-content>
        </v-list-item>
        
        <v-list-item>
          <v-list-item-content>
            <v-list-item-subtitle>当前步数</v-list-item-subtitle>
            <v-list-item-title>{{ simulation.step_count || 0 }}</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item-content>
        </v-list-item>
        
        <v-list-item v-if="simulation.is_captured">
          <v-list-item-content>
            <v-list-item-subtitle>捕获时间</v-list-item-subtitle>
            <v-list-item-title>{{ simulation.capture_time ? simulation.capture_time.toFixed(2) + ' 秒' : '未知' }}</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item-content>
        </v-list-item>
        
        <v-list-item>
          <v-list-item-content>
            <v-list-item-subtitle>创建时间</v-list-item-subtitle>
            <v-list-item-title>{{ formatDate(simulation.created_at) }}</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item-content>
        </v-list-item>
      </v-list>
    </v-card>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
    name: 'SimulationInfo',
    props: {
      simulation: {
        type: Object,
        required: true,
        default: () => ({})
      }
    },
    methods: {
      formatDate(dateString) {
        if (!dateString) return '未知';
        const date = new Date(dateString);
        return date.toLocaleString();
      },
      
      formatAlgorithm(algorithm) {
        const map = {
          'APF': '人工势场法',
          'CONSENSUS': '共识算法'
        };
        return map[algorithm] || algorithm;
      }
    }
  }
  </script>
  
  <style scoped>
  .simulation-info-card {
    border-radius: 4px;
  }
  
  .info-title {
    font-size: 1rem;
    padding: 8px 16px !important;
    min-height: 40px;
  }
  
  .v-list-item {
    min-height: 36px !important;
    padding: 0 16px !important;
  }
  
  @media (max-height: 768px) {
    .v-list-item {
      min-height: 32px !important;
      padding: 0 12px !important;
    }
  }
  </style>
